name: Match To Win: Cash Giveaway
description:
Play Match To Win Sweepstakes for free puzzle matching fun, as well as free sweepstakes entries! Win BIG with free real cash giveaways, sweepstakes with real money prizes, and much more!

There are tons of ways to win - absolutely FREE. We have instant, daily and monthly giveaways, where sweepstakes winners can take home tens, hundreds or even thousands of dollars!

Match To Win is free to play. Anybody can win our free sweepstakes – enter for yourself and see!

There are more ways to win with our free $2,500 INSTANT winner scratchers! Find new ways to win big every day – scratch and see what treasures are inside!

Like Match 3 puzzle games? Match To Win has plenty! Enjoy match 3 games set in a tropical Hawaiian paradise, get free daily gifts and uncover bonus levels!

MATCH TO WIN FEATURES:

FREE SWEEPSTAKES

Win Big with Free Instant Win Scratchers
• Scratch your card for a free chance to win real money
• Win up to $2,500 in REAL CASH, instantly!

Tons of New Sweepstakes
• Enter sweepstakes for chances to win FREE cash
• Chances to win $1,000 Monthly and $50 Daily
• Giveaways are always changing, so check back often!


MATCH 3 GAMES

Fun Match 3 Gameplay
• Match 3 games in the Hawaiian Islands!
• Fun puzzle games with beautiful visuals
• Match three jewels to play free!

Free Rewards & Bonus Games
• Earn FREE game-play power ups daily and hourly
• Uncover bonus levels for big win chances
• Unlock daily gifts and boosts
• Complete Quests for power ups

Endless Match Game Adventures
• Explore across the Hawaiian Islands
• Visit beaches, volcanoes, and helicopter over Waimea Canyon!
• More exciting vacation destinations to come!

Fun times and great rewards await! Download Match To Win today and start solving puzzles. Enter our real cash giveaways for your chance to win!

VALID IN THE UNITED STATES ONLY. RESTRICTIONS APPLY.

Privacy Policy - https://rewardifynow.com/policy/
Terms of Service - https://rewardifynow.com/terms/
Sweepstakes Rules - https://rewardifynow.com/sweepstakesterms/

Apple is not a sponsor nor is involved in any way these contests or sweepstakes. Success within this game does not imply future success with real money gambling. This game does not offer real money gambling. This game is intended for an adult audience.
